model Person {
    fields {
      name Text
    }
}

===

model Person {
    fields {
        name Text
    }
}

model Animal {
    fields {
        name Text
    }
}

===

CREATE TABLE "Animal"(
"name" TEXT NOT NULL,
"id" TEXT NOT NULL,
"createdAt" TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
"updatedAt" TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

=== 

[
  { "Model": "Animal", "Field": "", "Type": "ADDED" }
]
